supports_statement_cache?:
Returns true, since this connection adapter supports prepared statement
caching.
disconnect!:
Disconnects from the database if already connected. Otherwise, this
method does nothing.
ENCODINGS:
Taken from here:
  https://github.com/tmtm/ruby-mysql/blob/master/lib/mysql/charset.rb
Author: TOMITA Masahiro <tommy@tmtm.org>
client_encoding: Get the client encoding for this database
configure_connection:
Many Rails applications monkey-patch a replacement of the configure_connection method
and don't call 'super', so leave this here even though it looks superfluous.
version: Returns the version of the connected MySQL server.
